about_the_game:
Summary

Find or Be Found is an asymmetric co-op horror game. Go on heists as a pair of burglars looking for the most valuable items in haunted houses. Locate the specific item to earn money and progress, but search for too long, and unimaginable horrors will awaken.

Play as either the hacker or the robber. Only the hacker knows what to steal and where to find it, and only the robber inside the house can grab it. Communication is key.

Hacker

As the hacker, you are the only one who knows what the item looks like, where it is, and when the monster is nearby. You must guide the robber using maps and cameras.

  • Describe the item

  • Check your cameras

  • Manage resources

Robber

As the robber, locate your way around the house, bring back the item described, and hide when the monster comes. Be fast and discrete, and don't make any mistakes.

  • Locate and steal the items

  • Hide from the monster

  • Communicate your location

Earn Money, Upgrade Gear

If you survive the heist, use the loot to buy and upgrade your tools and gadgets. Raise the stakes and be prepared for everything.

  • Communication tools

  • Cameras

  • And more..!

Only through communication can you and your partner in crime survive the horrors that await you. Visit different haunted houses, steal the cursed items ordered by the mysterious organization, and get out before you are caught. A horrible fate lurks in the shadows, ready to claim the life of anyone foolish enough to enter their domain.

The game is still in development and certain aspects may change from what can be seen and are described. Join our discord community to follow the development, find fellow burglars to play with, and share your ideas for the game!

content_descriptors.notes: The game has semi-realistic atmosphere that sets up for a uncomfortable experience. Players will die in various ways and show blood doing so. There will be objects around that show dismembered body parts and sometimes with things in them.
